    • Method Detail

      • getPositions

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPositions()
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing both current and old positions

      • register

        public void register()
        register the elf. it is added to the ArrayList of elves from its factory

      • retireElf

        public void retireElf()
        retire the elf. it is removed from the ArrayList of elves AND its run method stops

      • move

        public void move()
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        the elf tries to move until it succeeds when it moves, it also creates a gift and sends it to the factory
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
